titleStmt.title: The boke of demaundes of the scyence of phylosophye, and astronomye, betwene kynge Boctus, and the phylosopher Sydracke.
titleStmt.author: Boccus, King.
Sidrac, 13th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by me Robert Wyer, dwellynge in the Duke of Suffolkes rentes, besyde charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date estimated by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
